content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
     DeviceState, AVG(CoreTemp) as AvgCoreTemp
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dronetelemetrydatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw-data/dataset.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', 
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (CoreTemp FLOAT, DeviceState VARCHAR(30) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8)
    AS [rows]
    GROUP BY DeviceState
    ORDER BY AVG(CoreTemp) DESC
